info.title: Navigate forward from the last focusable element to the first focusable element in a modal dialog

raw.name: NVDA
raw.defaultConfigurationInstructionsHTML: Configure NVDA with default settings. For help, read <a href="https://github.com/w3c/aria-at/wiki/Configuring-Screen-Readers-for-Testing">Configuring Screen Readers for Testing</a>.

instructions: If NVDA made the focus mode sound, press <kbd>Insert</kbd>+<kbd>Space</kbd> again to turn browse mode back on.
If NVDA made the browse mode sound, press <kbd>Insert</kbd>+<kbd>Space</kbd> again to turn focus mode back on.

setupScript.scriptDescription: opens the 'Add Delivery Address' modal dialog, and sets focus on the 'Cancel' button
setupScript.name: openAddDeliveryAddressDialogAndFocusCancelButton

instructions.instructions: Starting at the last focusable element in the dialog, the 'Cancel' button, navigate forward to the first focusable element, the  'Street' input.

browseMode: Configure NVDA with default settings. For help, read <a href="https://github.com/w3c/aria-at/wiki/Configuring-Screen-Readers-for-Testing">Configuring Screen Readers for Testing</a>.
If NVDA made the focus mode sound, press <kbd>Insert</kbd>+<kbd>Space</kbd> again to turn browse mode back on.
focusMode: Configure NVDA with default settings. For help, read <a href="https://github.com/w3c/aria-at/wiki/Configuring-Screen-Readers-for-Testing">Configuring Screen Readers for Testing</a>.
If NVDA made the browse mode sound, press <kbd>Insert</kbd>+<kbd>Space</kbd> again to turn focus mode back on.

assertions.assertionStatement: The ability to enter or edit text is conveyed
assertions.assertionPhrase: convey the ability to enter or edit text

assertions.assertionStatement: Screen reader switched from reading mode to interaction mode
assertions.assertionPhrase: switch from reading mode to interaction mode

tokenizedAssertionStatements.jaws: JAWS switched from virtual cursor active to PC cursor active
tokenizedAssertionStatements.nvda: NVDA switched from browse mode to focus mode

tokenizedAssertionPhrases.jaws: switch from virtual cursor active to PC cursor active
tokenizedAssertionPhrases.nvda: switch from browse mode to focus mode
